creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. L. Carpenter
description: plate, ceramic, armorial, with coat-of-arms, floral sprays painted in enamel over the glaze, the floral sprays on the rim painted in aubergine, green, and pink, are enclosed in shaped panels of white on white, surrounding the coat-of-arms in the center are other floral sprays in the same space colors interrupted with scrolls of white on white, Chinese Export  cat. card dims 9-1/4'; card now changed to 'French XIXc'
title: Plate
